com.reportmill.shape

Class RMShapePainterJ2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reportmill.shape.RMShapePainterJ2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RMPainter, RMShapePainter, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RMShapePainterJ2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements RMShapePainter
    This class manages the painting of shapes to a Java2D graphics object.
